ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Gems!
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh multiplayer is goign to be pointless. There really is a way you can use where you can play non stop. I m bored of the game but then better then doing
ygData.messageBody:
Heh multiplayer is goign to be pointless. There really is a way you can use
where you can play non stop. I'm bored of the game but then better then
doing nothing while waiting on spawns to level your new primary heh.

Naeeldar

----- Original Message -----
From: <beatdropbattledrum@...>
To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 07, 2001 3:51 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Gems!


> I just sat at the Lake Rathe zone in SK with my enchanter and played
> gems last night. I learned many secrets... I am the gems master! :P
>
> It's awesome when playing low level casters that have to stare at the
> spell book to med. It works in the spell book! Woohoo!
>
> Can't wait for the multiplayer version! :)
>
> ~Beatdrop
>
>
> --- In eqbards@y..., "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@m...> wrote:
> > I logged on this morning for my daily 40 mins of pre-work bard
> leveling...
> > and all i did was sit at the bank in fv and play gems. I'm
> addicted.
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Michael [mailto:jackal@v...]
> > > Sent: Wednesday, March 07, 2001 1:09 PM
> > > To: eqbards@y...
> > > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Gems!
> > >
> > >
> > > Heh there is a way where anybody can go non stop.
> > >
> > > Naeeldar
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@m...>
> > > To: <eqbards@y...>
> > > Sent: Wednesday, March 07, 2001 2:18 PM
> > > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Gems!
> > >
> > >
> > > > ROFL
> > > > No, honestly, I just suck!
> > > >
> > > > > -----Original Message-----

> > > > > Sent: Wednesday, March 07, 2001 12:15 PM
> > > > > To: 'eqbards@y...'
> > > > > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Gems!
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > > my guess is stop twisting/buffing the group halana if ya
> > > > > wanna get further
> > > > > 8)
> > > > >
> > > > > -----Original Message-----
> > > > > From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@m...]

> > > > > To: 'eqbards@y...'
> > > > > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Gems!
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > > /rude
> > > > >
> > > > > I only got to wave 4!!!
> > > > >
> > > > > gimme your secrets lol
> > > > >
> > > > > > -----Original Message-----
> > > > > > From: beatdropbattledrum@h...
> > > > > > [mailto:beatdropbattledrum@h...]
> > > > > > Sent: Wednesday, March 07, 2001 11:48 AM
> > > > > > To: eqbards@y...
> > > > > > Subject: [eqbards] Gems!
> > > > > >

> > > > > > I got to Wave 32 last night... anyone top that? :)
